about_the_game:
A stage-clearing 3D wire action game that tests your "use of wire movement inertia" and "puzzle-solving skills."
The shapes of all 26 stages are based on various letters of the alphabet.
Complete the missions for each stage!


In this game, mastering "wire movement inertia," "puzzle-solving skills," and "precision control" is crucial.

What is Wire Movement?

You can perform wire movement by left-clicking to "attach the wire" and right-clicking (either repeatedly or holding down) to "pull the wire."
The pulling force of the wire can be adjusted in 4 levels, allowing you to change your speed.
The wire can be attached at any distance without limitation, but if the wire touches a wall, it will retract, and you'll need to reattach it.
This allows you to enjoy aerial movement with simple controls.

What Missions Are There?

The primary mission for each stage is to "reach the destination."
Many stages cannot be cleared just by speeding through with wire movement.
Because the stages have very simple shapes, you'll feel a bit of "itchiness" as you play.

Other Missions?

As you progress through the later stages, the difficulty increases, and the missions become more unique.
For example:
The "X" stage: "Avoid incoming bullets flying across in a cross pattern."
The "V" stage: "Knock down all the bowling pins."
The "U" stage: "Guide the car along the U-shaped road."

What are the Gimmicks?

Stages feature the following gimmicks, requiring precise control:
・Walls where wires cannot be attached
・Blocks that can be moved by attaching the wire
・Laser traps
・Slippery floors
・Bullet dodging

Regarding game streaming

No need to contact us before streaming.
If possible, we’d appreciate it if you could include the Steam store URL in the description.

※ The game fully supports controllers, but mouse controls are recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1, Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1, Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Alphabet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 / AMD Phenom II X4 810
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon HD 6310
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
